title: Bite Me with Dr. Mike
overview: This series travels the globe to show travelers what not to do with tiny creatures that pack a hefty punch. Whether it is an acid-spewing ant or an explosive beetle, Dr. Mike Leahy is on the lookout for the creepiest crawlies in this action-packed series. Scouring the globe for some of the most advanced killers in the animal kingdom, Mike proves that size does not matter when it comes to posing the biggest threat to humans. Under the watchful eye of medics Mike endeavors to understand the science behind their secret weapons, and highlight how to avoid an unwanted close encounter.
